basics.name: Lewis Monaghan
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I'm an A level student at North East Futures UTC. I finish in summer 2026 where I plan to go to university that september

education.institution: North East Futures UTC, Newcastle Upon Tyne

highlights: Developed communication skills through handling customers
Multitask skills through having different responsibilities in my position
Serving food to guests and clearing plates

volunteer.summary: Oversees squardron inventory & assists in Duke of Edinburugh management
highlights: Gained valuable skills that can be used in the workplace
Teach cadets classification, allowing them to progress through their cadet career
Plan & communicate with fellow NCOs to provide a better learning environment & to ansure fun activities that allow cadets to grow as people

awards.title: Duke of Edinburgh's Award Scheme
awards.summary: Having completed Bronze & Silver, I'm currently working on my Gold award through Cadets. I've furthered my communication, teamwork, and time-management skills and mentored new recruits in my squardron
